ivardefs.name: additionalMonitoringIndicator
ivardefs.desc: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to additional monitoring for regulatory reasons.

ivardefs.name: attachedDocument_
ivardefs.desc: Supporting documentation, typically for regulatory submission.

ivardefs.name: clinicalTrial_
ivardefs.desc: Clinical trials or studies that this product is involved in.

ivardefs.name: combinedPharmaceuticalDoseForm
ivardefs.desc: The dose form for a single part product, or combined form of a multiple part product.

ivardefs.name: contact_
ivardefs.desc: A product specific contact, person (in a role), or an organization.

ivardefs.name: crossReference_
ivardefs.desc: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: General description of this product.

ivardefs.name: domain
ivardefs.desc: If this medicine applies to human or veterinary uses.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifier for this product. Could be an MPID.

ivardefs.name: indication
ivardefs.desc: General combined description of indication(s) for this product. See also MedicinalProductDefinitionIndication.

ivardefs.name: ingredient_
ivardefs.desc: The ingredients of this medicinal product - when not specified elsewhere. This is only needed if the ingredients are not specified by the pharmaceuticalProduct or packagedMedicinalProduct references above. In cases where those levels of detail are not use

ivardefs.name: legalStatusOfSupply
ivardefs.desc: The legal status of supply of the medicinal product as classified by the regulator.

ivardefs.name: manufacturingBusinessOperation_
ivardefs.desc: An operation applied to the product, for manufacturing or adminsitrative purpose.

ivardefs.name: marketingStatus_
ivardefs.desc: Marketing status of the medicinal product, in contrast to marketing authorizaton.

ivardefs.name: masterFile_
ivardefs.desc: A master file for to the medicinal product (e.g. Pharmacovigilance System Master File).

ivardefs.name: name_
ivardefs.desc: The product's name, including full name and possibly coded parts.

ivardefs.name: packagedMedicinalProduct_
ivardefs.desc: Package representation for the product.

ivardefs.name: paediatricUseIndicator
ivardefs.desc: If authorised for use in children.

ivardefs.name: pharmaceuticalProduct_
ivardefs.desc: Pharmaceutical aspects of product.

ivardefs.name: productClassification_
ivardefs.desc: Allows the product to be classified by various systems.

ivardefs.name: specialMeasures_
ivardefs.desc: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to special measures for regulatory reasons.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Regulatory type, e.g. Investigational or Authorized.

properties.desc: Detailed definition of a medicinal product, typically for uses other than direct patient care (e.g. regulatory use).
